report.title: Withdrawal from Ginkgo
report.author: Lucas
report.bodytext: Hi, I would just like to give a little warning about Gingko Biloba. /n /n I am an 18 year old swedish student that for some time has taken Gingko pills. (pure EGb 761) Two per day. And when I for two days forgot to eat them I became Extreamly tired. (!) /n /n I didnt manage to get out of bed at all for a day, hardly able to lift my arms, feeling tired for several days following. I meen I could get out of bed but in the same way I probably can run five miles at top speed to if I tried... /n /n I am now taking them again and feeling fine but I thought you should know the story. I dont think its such a big deal and I dont know if this is a single case with just me but... knowledge is knowledge. /n /n Have a great time and care about your friends and fellow people.
